centerName: ST PAULS UMC SUMMER DAY CAMP
permitHolder: ST PAULS UNITED METHODIST CHURCH SDC

latestInspection.result: Inspection Result Initial Annual Inspection - Passed inspection with no violations

violations.Violation Summary: Camp health program not maintained and/or supervised by physician Health records of campers and staff are not kept and maintained plan is not comprehensive and complete nutrition emergency and first aid plan accident reporting disaster search and rescue child observation food and facility maintenance not included
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: In addition to Health Director camp fails to provide one staff member per 50 campers currently certified in standard first aid and personal safety in addition to waterfront supervisor camp fails to provide one staff member per 100 campers certified in CPR
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: All camp staff have not had recent medical exam including TB testing as required by the Dept

pastInspections.result: Reinspection Required Violations corrected at time of inspection
